channel.title: Comments on: Accidentally took a big one for the team yesterday
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: TheUnitShifterxbone
item.dc:creator: TheUnitShifterxbone
item.description: That’s like when Im trying to show my team how to move forward.
item.content:encoded: That’s like when Im trying to show my team how to move forward.

item.title: By: Lock3down221
item.dc:creator: Lock3down221
item.description: Side comment I still don't understand why anyone would use AA tanks in Provence. Sure it shreds infantry but you'll get wrecked by the other regular tanks. You get the same results when using the other tanks and are much more effective overall.
item.content:encoded: Side comment I still don’t understand why anyone would use AA tanks in Provence. Sure it shreds infantry but you’ll get wrecked by the other regular tanks. You get the same results when using the other tanks and are much more effective overall.

item.title: By: Haggisandhorses
item.dc:creator: Haggisandhorses
item.description: LOL me too. I took a panzerfaust to the face when rounding a corner next to one of our tanks the other day
item.content:encoded: LOL me too. I took a panzerfaust to the face when rounding a corner next to one of our tanks the other day

item.title: By: relpmeraggy

item.description: How is committing suicide taking one for the team?
item.content:encoded: How is committing suicide taking one for the team?
